checkout_description: Checkout is to notify the RCS team of the product or service you are interested in purchasing. In the checkout form, You can notify the RCS team by entering name, phone number and email address correctly. The RCS team will notify you by phone as soon as possible after receiving your notice. After that, you can inquire about the details of the product or service you want to buy and the RCS team will also ask you about the price or product related to the product or service. Payment methods will be explained in detail. You can also contact the phone number 09 799501600.
